jersey.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a shirt made of soft material, worn by players of sports such as football and rugby
jersey.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a piece of clothing made of wool that covers the upper part of your body and your arms
jersey.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a soft material made of cotton or wool
jersey.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a light brown cow that gives high-quality milk
